mapper.select: SELECT si.`code`, s.images, s.design_no, s.style_name, si.color, si.size, si.position, si.count, sai.allocate_count, sai.remarks FROM t_sample_allocate_item sai JOIN t_sample_allocate sa ON sa.id = sai.sample_allocate_id JOIN t_sample_item si ON si.id = sai.sample_id JOIN t_sample s ON s.id = sai.sample_id WHERE sample_allocate_id = #{sampleAllocateId} ORDER BY sai.create_date DESC
